conversation.content:
- 'topic_id': 3f14f1ec235a46e3b702c856959
  'name': Update Contact
  'topic_description': The user wants to update their personal contact details
    in the HR system.
  'attribute':
    8f344debfcb644898aadb792905:
      'name': contact_type
      'description': The type of contact detail to be updated.
      'required_values':
      - email
      - phone number
      - address
      - emergency contact
    d2948bdcba664a968f37990f306:
      'name': new_value
      'description': The new value for the contact detail being updated.
- 'topic_id': e02b7bf36f0e4559949213bcf20
  'name': Check Benefits
  'topic_description': The user wants to view their employee benefits, such as
    health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off.
  'attribute':
    8da14f992e674fc890e687145b4:
      'name': benefit_type
      'description': The type of benefit to view, such as health insurance,
        retirement plans, or paid time off.
- 'topic_id': 1265a00ec2c04bbd95395a0132a
  'name': Transfer Feedback
  'topic_description': The intent is to provide feedback on the transfer process
    or the new team/department.
  'attribute':
    7a471c7b992f4d55a836cb0356a:
      'name': feedback_type
      'description': The type of feedback being provided.
    6ba80ad374c64b91b5b5d8c9d42:
      'name': previous_team
      'description': The team or department the employee was transferred from.
      'required_values':
      - marketing
      - sales
      - IT
      - HR
    3abc428df21349d7b59f924942e:
      'name': new_team
      'description': The team or department the employee was transferred to.
- 'topic_id': 251a9982fe1544d7976035d427a
  'name': Transfer Training
  'topic_description': The intent is to request training or resources related to
    the new role or team.
  'attribute':
    33bd3c0670624cb19961c57b28f:
      'name': department
      'description': The department or team that the employee is transferring
        to.
    dd01d92c5e4841bba8b2d11e988:
      'name': role
      'description': The new role that the employee will be assuming in the
        new department or team.
    0772eb74f34446209a2b17a1ebd:
      'name': training_type
      'description': The type of training or resources that the employee needs
        for the new role or team.
- 'topic_id': 66c9acfe921349e0ba9c044becb
  'name': Update Transfer Status
  'topic_description': The intent is to check the status of an ongoing transfer
    request.
  'attribute':
    d7cc50d7115a428f8efddb4cc2c:
      'name': employee_id
      'description': The unique identifier of the employee who requested the
        transfer.
    0392c2f61ebc48209b2f29b9a72:
      'name': department
      'description': The department to which the employee is being transferred.
      'required_values':
      - IT
      - HR
      - Finance
    336d7b84c4c54a2187b761482f9:
      'name': status
      'description': The current status of the transfer request.
- 'topic_id': 7ba658b4e389491a9d3b72740fb
  'name': Find Forms
  'topic_description': The user wants to locate and download necessary HR forms,
    such as expense reports, time-off requests, and tax forms.
  'attribute':
    438a3208a6414e3fae5fd551951:
      'name': form_type
      'description': The type of HR form to locate and download.
      'required_values':
      - expense_report
      - time_off_request
      - tax_form
      - direct_deposit_form
      - benefits_enrollment
